function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Supporting local production closer to point of consumption without considering environmental impacts.","Impact":"Increased environmental impacts and pollution.","Mitigation":"Conduct environmental impact assessments and implement sustainable production practices.","Technologies":"Green technology for sustainable production and waste management.","People":"Local communities, workers, and consumers.","Owner":"Local governments, industries, and environmental organizations."},{"Description":"Overcrowding, slums, and informal settlements creating contagion hotspots.","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease transmission and outbreaks.","Mitigation":"Upgrading housing infrastructure, implementing social distancing measures, and improving public health services in these areas.","Technologies":"Smart city technology for urban planning and infrastructure development.","People":"Residents of overcrowded areas, local health authorities, and urban planners.","Owner":"Government, NGOs, and urban development agencies."},{"Description":"Inadequate health insurance coverage for different classes of society.","Impact":"Unequal access to healthcare and increased vulnerability to contagious diseases.","Mitigation":"Restructuring national health insurance programs, complementing with state insurance schemes, and improving data-driven decision-making for health coverage.","Technologies":"Healthcare data analytics for identifying coverage gaps and digital health platforms for access to healthcare services.","People":"Underprivileged communities, uninsured individuals, and vulnerable populations.","Owner":"Government health agencies, insurance providers, and healthcare organizations."},{"Description":"Lack of support for innovation-driven entrepreneurial framework.","Impact":"Limited economic growth and job opportunities, especially in underserved areas.","Mitigation":"Implementing entrepreneurship support programs, fostering innovation ecosystems, and providing access to funding and mentorship for startups.","Technologies":"Digital platforms for business support and innovation, access to online education and training, and financial technology for small business financing.","People":"Entrepreneurs, startups, and small business owners.","Owner":"Government, venture capital firms, and business development organizations."}]}
